name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior Data Engineer with over 10 years of experience in ETL processes, Data Warehousing, and cloud-based solutions. Proficient in utilizing **AWS**, **Azure**, and **Snowflake** to build and optimize data pipelines. Skilled in Agile methodologies including **Scrum** and **Kanban**, ensuring timely delivery of high-quality projects. Expertise in Data Modelling techniques such as **Kimball**, **Inmon**, and **Data Vault**. Strong background in automation and deploying scalable data solutions, complemented by a proven ability to collaborate with stakeholders and communicate complex concepts effectively. Previous contributions to significant projects at leading firms, including VISA, Sii Poland, and Reply Polska.

experience.responsibilities:
Utilized **AWS** and **Azure** to deploy and manage ETL processes, optimizing data extraction, transformation, and loading in **Snowflake**.
Designed and implemented data models using principles from **Kimball**, **Inmon**, and **Data Vault** to support robust data warehousing solutions, facilitating data-driven decision-making.
Engineered ETL workflows with **Apache Airflow** for automated data pipelines, ensuring consistent data quality with a processing rate of over **1 million** transactions per day.
Applied Agile methodologies and participated in **Scrum** and **Kanban** processes to improve project timelines and stakeholder engagement.
Developed and maintained relational databases and efficiently integrated with third-party API data sources, fostering a seamless data environment and reducing query times by **30%**.
Led cross-functional and stakeholder meetings to communicate progress and gather requirements, enhancing collaborative efforts and project outcomes.
Implemented DevOps practices, leveraging tools like Terraform for infrastructure as code, resulting in a deployment success rate of over **95%**.

- Developed and maintained ETL processes for extracting, transforming, and loading data into **Snowflake**, ensuring efficient data warehouse performance.
- Engineered data engineering solutions on **AWS** and **Azure** platforms, enabling secure and scalable data integrations and analytics.
- Collaborated within Agile methodologies such as **Scrum** and **Kanban** to enhance team productivity and deliver quality data services on time.
- Created and optimized data models based on **Kimball**, **Inmon**, and **Data Vault** methodologies, improving data accessibility and reporting capabilities.
- Implemented automation strategies using **Python**, **FastAPI**, and **Apache Airflow** to streamline data workflows and enhance operational efficiency.
- Successfully deployed and monitored data pipelines and microservices on **Azure App Services** using **Terraform** for infrastructure as code, achieving a **30%** reduction in deployment times.
- Conducted regular security audits to maintain compliance with industry standards, integrating **OAuth2** and **Azure AD B2C** for managing authentication and access control securely.
- Facilitated effective communication and stakeholder management across various teams to ensure alignment on project objectives and successful delivery of data products.

• Designed and implemented ETL processes utilizing **AWS** and **Azure** cloud services for integrating data into a robust **Data Warehouse** architecture, enhancing data accessibility by **40%**.
• Developed data models based on **Kimball** and **Inmon** methodologies to structure data effectively, facilitating improved reporting capabilities and analysis.
• Leveraged **Snowflake** for scalable storage solutions, optimizing data retrieval speeds by **25%** through efficient querying strategies.
• Automated data pipelines and workflows, reducing data processing time by **30%** through innovative **DevOps** practices and scripting solutions.
• Collaborated in agile teams using **Scrum** and **Kanban** methodologies to ensure project milestones are met on time, resulting in a **15%** increase in team productivity.
• Developed and maintained relational databases with a focus on optimization and performance tuning, resolving database issues, achieving uptime of **99.9%**.
• Communicated effectively with stakeholders to gather requirements and ensure alignment on project objectives, enhancing stakeholder satisfaction by **20%**.
• Engaged in problem-solving discussions to address data quality issues and implement solutions swiftly, utilizing critical thinking to enhance data reliability.
